name: homer
description: Homer is a simple static homepage for organizing links and small informational widgets. Configuration is done via a YAML file and the resulting single page site can be hosted on any web server, ideal for lightweight dashboards.
features: Static Site: Generate a fast, static homepage that can be hosted anywhere.
YAML Configuration: Define all links and settings in a single, easy-to-edit YAML file.
No Backend Required: Pure HTML/CSS/JS with no server-side processing needed.
Service Icons: Automatic icon fetching or use custom icons for your services.
Search Bar: Built-in search to quickly find services across all categories.
Keyboard Navigation: Navigate your dashboard efficiently with keyboard shortcuts.
Offline Support: Works without internet connection once loaded.
Minimal Resources: Extremely lightweight with fast load times on any device.
